About.title: About
About.about: Passionate full-stack developer with a strong foundation in modern web technologies. I enjoy building scalable applications and learning new technologies to solve complex problems.

Hiring.title: Why hire me?
Hiring.hybridPitch: Shipping-focused software engineer: turn specs into reliable, measurable product increments.
Hiring.paragraph1: I bring a strong technical foundation, problem-solving mindset, and dedication to delivering quality solutions that meet real user needs.
Hiring.paragraph2: I'm a Software Engineering student with hands-on experience in software engineering through my apprenticeship and internship roles. I'm passionate about learning and applying modern technologies to build meaningful solutions.
Hiring.paragraph3: I am a quick learner and I am always looking to learn new things. I can work independently and I love a challenge. Whether you're looking for a full-time engineer or an apprentice to join your team, I'd love to hear from you.
Hiring.whyDifferent: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating user experiences that truly matter. My combination of technical skills and problem-solving helps me build solutions that are both functional and delightful.
Hiring.preference1: Amazing work culture. I value environments that promote growth, collaboration, and innovation.
Hiring.preference2: Remote-friendly. I believe in the power of flexible work arrangements and asynchronous collaboration.
Hiring.preference3: Meaningful projects. I'm passionate about working on products that make a real difference in people's lives.
